name: lustiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being healthy, energetic, and full of strength and power: She brings a full-throated, full-bodied lustiness to her role. The team played with lustiness and energy. See
lusty
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a lustiness about him.The lustiness of their lyrics is undeniable.The musicians brought enthusiastic lustiness to their performance.
